# thecloud_load_balancer (Resource)

Load Balancer resource allows you to manage traffic distribution.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "thecloud_vpc" "main" {
  name = "main-vpc"
}

resource "thecloud_load_balancer" "web" {
  name   = "web-lb"
  vpc_id = thecloud_vpc.main.id
  port   = 80
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the load balancer.
- `port` (Number) The port the load balancer listens on.
- `vpc_id` (String) The ID of the VPC this load balancer belongs to.

### Optional

- `algorithm` (String) The load balancing algorithm (round-robin, least-connections).

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the load balancer.
- `status` (String) The status of the load balancer.
